title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: cheap Uniden solar power banks, 50% off sportswear and equipment, free beer from BWS and more!

1. Free rent for a year: We don't normally run competitions in Six Deals, but this one is better than most. Leatherman is offering the chance to win a year's worth of free rent up to a value of $25,000 (the Australian average.) To be in the running, all you have to do is explain in 25 words or less why you deserve to win. There are also 20 Leatherman T2 multitools up for grabs as runner-up prizes. Click here to enter!

2. 50% off sports gear: Catch is having a clearance sale on sporting goods with up to 50% off select items. There are over 950 products to choose from, including shoes, sportswear, sports equipment and accessories. Click here!

3. FREE BEER: BWS is giving away free beer tomorrow at select outlets. Specifically, it's handing out the world's rarest six-pack which consists of six ultra-rare beers from around the world. To claim your freebie, simply head into one of the participating stores from 10am on 18 October. Click here for details!

4. 30% off solar power banks: Portable power banks are a great way to extend your phone's battery life but you need to remember to charge the bloody things. Not so the 8000mAh Uniden UPP80S: it's solar powered, which means you'll always have some juice for charging on the go. You can currently get it from eBay for $69.95 - down from $99.99. Click here!

5. 40% off WoodWick Candles: If you're not into scented candles, you probably live with someone who is. Amazon has knocked up to 40% off fancy WoodWick varieties. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: cheap Uniden solar power banks, 50% off sportswear and equipment, free beer from BWS and more!...
